ca.ualberta.cmput301w15t13.Models

Class ExpenseItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301w15t13.Models.ExpenseItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExpenseClaim

    public class ExpenseItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExpenseClaim
    Expense item class models the functionality of an expense Claim. It should be used to store relevant expenseItem information such as a photo receipt or a puchaseDate. Classes it works with: Currency,Category,Receipt,
